actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules,of the Senate to require the Committee on Rules and Administration to develop, implement, update as necessary a strategic planning process for the functional and technical infrastructure support of the Senate.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Senate and the Sergeant at Arms to: (1) assist the Committee on Rules and Administration in developing and implementing a strategic plan for the functional and technical infrastructure of the Senate; and (2) prepare for approval by the Committee implementation plans and proposed budgets for areas of infrastructure support for which they are responsible.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules,of the Senate to require the Committee on Rules and Administration to develop, implement, update as necessary a strategic planning process for the functional and technical infrastructure support of the Senate.
